columns.description: Valid starting screen position for the combo. Midscreen/Back to corner/Corner/Any
Type of confirm. Neutral/Anti air/Crouching
Valid buttons that work as starter for the combo
The combo string itself
The final damage of the combo (assuming no Active Flow/Counterhit or any buffs)
Meter gain for the combo
Minimum meter you have to have before starting the combo.
How many gravitons you will spend doing this combo
How many gravitons you recover from this combo
A simple label for the combo
A video example of the combo being done.
The situations you can get into once you pull off this combo, meaning setups/specific oki/etc. Can be one or more.
Minimum OD timer for the combo.
If the starter has to land as counter hit.
If the start has to land while you're already in overdrive.
Whether the combo contains an overdrive cancel or not.
5 Star based system to rank how far you will carry opponent. Each star after 1 is 25% of the screen, meaning 3 stars is half the screen, and 5 stars is corner to corner.
Whether the combo contains a rapid cancel.
An ambiguous check of the community, this being set to true means it is what is believed to be your optimal combo for the situation you got into.
Original combo section where the route appears.
